citation_details.title: The nature of neural object representations during dynamic occlusion
citation_details.author: L Teichmann, D Moerel, AN Rich, CI Baker
citation_details.abstract: Objects disappearing briefly from sight due to occlusion is an inevitable occurrence  in everyday life. Yet we generally have a strong experience that occluded objects continue
citation_details.short_author: L Teichmann, D Moerel, AN Rich, CI Baker
